name: Pascallove2d
tagline: A source to source compiler allowing Pascal developers to reuse code and develop games for the Love2D framework.
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
Welcome to the project page. This project aims to develop a pascal compiler to allow source-source compilation for pascal-LUA with a particular focus of providing a functional output that implements an interface over the Love2D framework (https://love2d.org/).

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
